text_block_list.name: Young Shion
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! This is amazing! Daddy you're amazing! 
You really look like you're flying with wings and everything!

text_block_list.name: Young Shion
text_block_list.text:
There's so much… clapping… Everyone's watching you… 
…It's like they're saying… they can't take their eyes off of you…

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: That's how it is for the principle… There's no replacement. The responsibility they hold is grand, it's not a role that you can reach with effort and determination alone.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: Talent, luck, and flair… there are times where all of them are necessary. These are things that you can't achieve on your own by taking your time.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: That's right. Your father here has a rival. He's my partner, friend… and an opponent I absolutely do not want to lose to.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: Since he was there, I was able to push myself. I was finally able to reach it. The place where I could face him head on.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text:
It was beautiful, and an extremely dazzling existence. 
—— The role of principal.

text_block_list.name: Shion's Father
text_block_list.text: In order to obtain that role, you have to captivate and surpass anyone you see… That type of strength is essential.

text_block_list.name: Young Shion
text_block_list.text:
Hah… daddy! I want to… I want to be just like you!! 
I want to be just like daddy, someday, everyone will be watching me!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
It didn't pan out like that… nothing went as planned… 
No matter how much I practiced, I felt like I never changed…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Even when mom and dad taught me so much… 
I want to keep doing ballet forever, but… I might not have… flair…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
But… I can't give up! 
What I saw that day, to be just like dad, I'll—!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: —That day when I was young, I heard my father's story and it wasthen I decided on my dream. I wanted to captivate a large audience, to become the principal.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Still, when I felt like I was going to give up on my dream… I found it. I found the stage.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's cheers and gazes are all… 
focused towards the winner. This is… a race?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Wow… this is amazing! 
Such passion and fervor!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: My legs are… shaking… I want to… run… run where they are! And then… and then… I'll take first place!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: — And become the principal!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, that's what I thought, and yet…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…I knew it, my time didn't get better. 
No change in sight…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (When I started running, I was seeing myself improve as long as I worked hard, but now…)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. I might need to start thinking of a few more training planning plans after all. Only doing the same thing is no good!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
The only thing I can do is keep giving it my all. 
Alrighty then—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: No matter how long it takes… I'll defeat her!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …—Hah—…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Okay! I still haven't tried out that training plan yet. 
Gotta focus and lock onto it! With effort and determination!
A few days have passed since I've started looking for an umamusume to scout. Day after day I was watching different umamusumes run when—
I heard a powerful yell come from the training grounds. When I turned to face that direction I saw a singular umamusume running with her all put into it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, hah! 
…Not yet! I need to give my all till the end!!
Of course this wasn't anything unique to her, but strangely enough, she left an impression on me.
That running that is dead set on rushing forward, without even wiping off her sweat. As though her life was on the line—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh!?
Those words came out of my mouth without thinking. And she heard those words as well. In an instant, right after she was amazed by those words—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I will!
Right away, she looked forward again and took off.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
My name is Win Variation! 
Um, thank you very much for cheering for me earlier!
choice_data_list: Sorry for shouting out of the blue.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Absolutely not! That… cheered me up quite a lot!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I'm not really talented, and when I focus on running, I can't think of anything else besides running…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Everyday, I check my form and practice the fundamentals. All so that I don't forget the basics.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
That's to say, I feel rewarded from that. 
…Hehe. It felt great running with all my spirit.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Anyways, I'm motivated again. I'll rest for a little longer and then I'll get right back to training! Keep working towards my dream—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …I… want to be like my father. Basking in the spotlight, basking in the endless applause and cheers…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: —And become the principal, just like my father.

A principal… That's… a word they use in ballet, right? 
I get it. It might be a little different from a stage, but she's aiming to become the principal in a race.

Running and aiming to be a principle… 
I'm getting more and more interested in her running now.
choice_data_list: Is it alright if I watch you run again?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah! O-of course! Go right ahead!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Hah. Wow… wowie…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. I did it, I did it! 
I'm so happy you said something to me!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! 
I'll put in all my effort to run well!

Her eyes were filled with hope. 
I'm looking forward to seeing her running.
